meanings.sent1: I bought two jarsful of pickles at the store.
meanings.sent2: The kitchen shelf was filled with jarsful of homemade jam.
meanings.sent3: The jarsful of cookies on the counter disappeared in no time!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room like jarsful of joy.
meanings.sent5: The jarsful of colorful marbles sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: The amount that a jar can hold.
meanings.sent1: Grandma stored jarsful of flour in the pantry.
meanings.sent2: The farmer filled the truck with jarsful of fresh milk.
meanings.sent3: The jarsful of coins clinked as they were poured out.
meanings.sent4: His heart overflowed with jarsful of love for his family.
meanings.sent5: The jarsful of rainwater collected on the windowsill.
